metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4901 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 8u60 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality, integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to JavaFX.

criterions.comment: openjfx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
